# Divine Protection (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** Allies in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 70

*You call upon your holy powers to aid your companions and a golden light appears from above, bathing them with sparkling radiance.*

Allies gain a +1 morale bonus to their Armor Class and on saving throws.
